resources.label: Question answering
resources.description: Based on a set of documents or dynamic content, create a chatbot or a question-answering feature grounded on specific content. E.g. building a Q&A resource from a broad knowledge base, providing customer service assistance.

resources.label: Summarization
resources.description: Transform text with domain-specific content into personalized overviews, capturing key points. E.g. sales conversation summaries, insurance coverage, meeting transcripts, and contract information.

resources.label: Retrieval-Augmented Generation
resources.description: Automatically incorporate information from external sources (such as documents, websites, or databases) to augment user queries and get more accurate, relevant, and contextually rich output.

resources.label: Classification
resources.description: Read and classify written input with as few as zero examples. E.g. sorting of customer complaints, threat & vulnerability classification, sentiment analysis, and customer segmentation.

resources.label: Generation
resources.description: Generate text content for a specific purpose. E.g. content creation for marketing campaigns, job descriptions, blog posts and articles, and email drafting support.

resources.label: Code generation and conversion
resources.description: Generate programming code based on natural-language prompts, make suggestions to complete partially written code, make instruction-based modifications in code (e.g. convert the code to another programming language), and automatically generate easily understandable code documentation.

resources.label: Extraction
resources.description: Identify and extract essential information from unstructured text. E.g. audit acceleration, SEC 10K fact extraction.

resources.label: Translation
resources.description: Translate text or speech from one language to another.

resources.label: Function calling
resources.description: The model supports function calling to interface with tools.

resources.label: Code generation
resources.description: Generate programming code based on natural-language prompts, make suggestions to complete partially written code, make instruction-based modifications in code (e.g. convert the code to another programming language), and automatically generate easily understandable code documentation.

resources.label: Code explanation
resources.description: Analyze source code and provide detailed explanations of how the code works, and what's its purpose and functionality.

resources.label: Code fixing
resources.description: Examine source code for potential problems and inefficiencies, identify and fix coding errors, generate code fix suggestions, optimize code performance, and make recommendations for improvements.
